Came here on other yelp reviews and was not disappointed. We ordered the minikilombo salad which was huge! So much food on one plate!  It also comes with 2 empanadas, a drink and coffee, all for 10.30€.  Definitely get the prosciutto and goat/Brie cheese with the potatoes (Around €7), chorizo or cheese and ham empanadas. The service was also excellent as our waiter spoke English and basically went through the whole menu with us.
